alert.note: Alert for Schuyler; Seneca; Yates (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 14 at 5:58PM EDT until March 15 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM EDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. Storm total snowfall amounts of 5 to 9 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph will cause blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Yates, Seneca and Schuyler counties. * WHEN...Until 8 AM EDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
